alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 4:20AM CDT until June 12 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 420 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Sweetwater to near Erick, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Sayre, Erick, Carter, Sweetwater, Delhi, and Berlin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
